title: Share of mobile banking users among mobile phone owners in the U.S. 2009 to 2016
summary: The statistic shows the Share of mobile in the Share from 2009 to 2016 .
According to the report , there were 1.58 million mobile who had personal wealth of over 10 billion yuan in 2016 , decreased from 1.61 million in the previous Year .
gold: This statistic presents the share of mobile banking users among mobile phone owners in the United States from 2009 to 2011 and a forecast thereof until 2016.
In 2011 , 29 percent of the mobile phone owners accessed banking services on their mobile phones and this number was predicted to increase to 51 percent in 2016.
Mobile banking – additional information Mobile phones are one of the most popular devices owned , and are used for personal and business purposes by people worldwide .
